name: Salomon Escape Outpath Boots - Unisex
description: Escape the track and explore untamed snow. The Escape Outpath are supportive and warm, with classic flex and a hinged cuff for support whether you're in track or out. The high cuff protects your feet when you're breaking new trail.Full gaiter keeps snow out while off-track.High cuff with Velcro® strap for a stable, secure fit.Quick-lace speed lacing system with zip-up lace covers.Abrasion-resistant vamp protects from ski edges.Thinsulate™ liner keeps feet warm.Touring fit is slightly generous for long-term comfort and 105mm width.
